rows.label: qst710402_msg0001
rows.name:
Bah! Fancy ditching your old mate
just 'cos you get a girlfriend.
Pretty lame, if you ask me!

rows.label: qst710402_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, it's you lot! You helped
me out before with that Leon
business, didn't you?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0003
rows.name:
What's that? There's someone
wants to join our posse...
And it's a young lady?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0004
rows.name:
Hmmm... Maybe life's just about
to start for ol' Azzaro!

rows.label: qst710402_msg0005
rows.name:
I mean... I'd better ask a few
questions to make sure... I don't
want to rush in like you-know-who...

rows.label: qst710402_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm going to need to apply
a little test... Just for
my piece of mind, y'see...

rows.label: qst710402_msg0007
rows.name:
Nothing too difficult.
Just a few questions.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0008
rows.name:
I just want to find out a little bit
about her passion for the bard's life.
Not everyone's built for it, y'know!

rows.label: qst710402_msg0009
rows.name:
The answers to these questions will let
me know if she's serious or just one
of these fly-by-night dilettantes.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0010
rows.name: OK. Brace yourself.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0101
rows.name:
Let's have a peer into the soul
of my prospective partner.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0102
rows.name: You want me to say it again?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0201
rows.name: Does she have any special skills?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0202
rows.name: Plays excellent flute

rows.label: qst710402_msg0203
rows.name: Nothing in particular

rows.label: qst710402_msg0301
rows.name:
The flute, eh? Actually, I think the
delicate timbre of the flute would be
a pretty good complement to my stuff.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0302
rows.name: OK. The next question.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0401
rows.name:
Is she a wallflower,
or a limelight-hog?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0402
rows.name: Usually shy, but a confident performer

rows.label: qst710402_msg0403
rows.name: Hates to be seen, a shrinking violet

rows.label: qst710402_msg0501
rows.name:
Ah, it sounds like a
contradiction, but a lot
of performers are like that.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0502
rows.name:
I'm the same sort. Usually I'm
reserved, but when I have an
audience, I open right up.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0503
rows.name: OK, next, how about this...

rows.label: qst710402_msg0601
rows.name: How's she feel about leaving Iira?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0602
rows.name: She's keen to visit far-off towns

rows.label: qst710402_msg0603
rows.name: She doesn't like leaving the house

rows.label: qst710402_msg0701
rows.name: Hmmm, OK. I see.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0702
rows.name:
From what you've told me, she sounds
like she'd make a cracking bard.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0703
rows.name:
She'll be a fine replacement
for that turncoat Leon.
Even better maybe!

rows.label: qst710402_msg0704
rows.name:
Well, let her know the good
news! From this day forth,
she's my new buddy!

rows.label: qst710402_msg0705
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Never had a girl in the
group before... This'll
make our lives rosier!

rows.label: qst710402_msg0801
rows.name:
Oh really... Well, sorry to
say, but I don't think she's
cut out for this bard's life.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0802
rows.name:
I'll just wait here for a
bit. Maybe you can find some
way to change my mind.
